title: How to Make Lemon Cupcakes with Lemon Frosting

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 180C (350F, gas mark 4).
In a bowl, add the sour cream and whip it until stiff peaks form.
steps.description: Place the bowl in the fridge.

steps.headline: Add all dry ingredients to a bowl.
In another bowl, beat the eggs and vanilla essence.
Add in lemon zest and sour cream to the egg mixture and beat well.
Gradually add the dry ingredients and whisk them using a hand whisk.
Pour the batter into a cup cake pan.
steps.description: Use paper cupcakes cases if you wish.

steps.headline: Bake them for 15 to 20 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean.
steps.description: While they are cooking, make your frosting.

steps.headline: Cream together the butter/margarine until it turns light and fluffy.
Add the lemon rind and mix through.
Beat in the icing sugar powder gradually.
steps.description: Keep beating until the resulting mixture becomes smooth.

steps.headline: Add the lemon juice.
steps.description: Only add small amounts until the icing becomes of a spreadable consistency. It is always better to add less than too much.

text:
Making the Cupcakes Preheat the oven to 180C (350F, gas mark 4). {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/23\/Make-Lemon-Cupcakes-with-Lemon-Frosting-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/23\/Make-Lemon-Cupcakes-with-Lemon-Frosting-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":344,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":567.7647058823529,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Sieve the flour. In a bowl, add the sour cream and whip it until stiff peaks form. Place the bowl in the fridge. Add all dry ingredients to a bowl. In another bowl, beat the eggs and vanilla essence. Add in lemon zest and sour cream to the egg mixture and beat well. Gradually add the dry ingredients and whisk them using a hand whisk. Pour the batter into a cup cake pan. Use paper cupcakes cases if you wish. Bake them for 15 to 20 minutes or until an inserted toothpick comes out clean. While they are cooking, make your frosting. Frosting and Serving Cream together the butter/margarine until it turns light and fluffy. Add the lemon rind and mix through. Beat in the icing sugar powder gradually. Keep beating until the resulting mixture becomes smooth. Add the lemon juice. Only add small amounts until the icing becomes of a spreadable consistency. It is always better to add less than too much. Frost the cupcakes!
